# The `OMPContext.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file provides helper functions and classes to deal with OpenMP contexts as used by <code>&#91;begin/end&#93; declare variant</code> and <code>metadirective</code>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/ompcontext">OMPContext</a></>}>
The context for a source location is made up of active property traits, e.g., device=&#123;kind(host)&#125;, and constructs traits which describe the nesting in OpenMP constructs at the location. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/ompcontext/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Description {#details}

This file provides helper functions and classes to deal with OpenMP contexts as used by <code>&#91;begin/end&#93; declare variant</code> and <code>metadirective</code>.

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Variant match information describes the required traits and how they are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">/// scored (via the ScoresMap). In addition, the required consturct nesting is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">/// decribed as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo">VariantMatchInfo</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add the trait \\p Property to the required trait set. \\p RawString is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// string we parsed and derived \\p Property from. If \\p Score is not null, it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// recorded as well. If \\p Property is in the &#96;construct&#96; set it is recorded</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in-order in the ConstructTraits as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo/#a33a4b99974af9aad9644042639286bf3"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo/#a33a4b99974af9aad9644042639286bf3">addTrait</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#aed19c754b6dc51a7f084d621b4043788">TraitProperty</a> Property, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RawString,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &#42;Score = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">             Score);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add the trait \\p Property which is in set \\p Set to the required trait</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// set. \\p RawString is the string we parsed and derived \\p Property from. If</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Score is not null, it recorded as well. If \\p Set is the &#96;construct&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// set it is recorded in-order in the ConstructTraits as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo/#a60e4982abd318e0ce35e9f1759b65870"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/omp/variantmatchinfo/#a60e4982abd318e0ce35e9f1759b65870">addTrait</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#ac053ab007366c857887d939adbeea976">TraitSet</a> Set, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#aed19c754b6dc51a7f084d621b4043788">TraitProperty</a> Property, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RawString,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if \\p VMI is applicable in \\p Ctx, that is, all traits required</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">/// by \\p VMI are available in the OpenMP context \\p Ctx. If \\p DeviceSetOnly is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">/// true, only the device selector set, if present, are checked. Note that we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">/// still honor extension traits provided by the user.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the index (into \\p VMIs) of the variant with the highest score</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from the ones applicble in \\p Ctx. See llvm::isVariantApplicableInContext.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#a7fe8accb4198eb111067fe7c4bb544dd">getBestVariantMatchForContext</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;VariantMatchInfo&gt;</a> &amp;VMIs,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-0850ceaef7df0277a483963b2b263ec6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo">DenseMapInfo</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp">omp</a>::TraitProperty&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-0850ceaef7df0277a483963b2b263ec6/#acdbea8daea873bc3a9853bd4160536dd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/omp/#aed19c754b6dc51a7f084d621b4043788">omp::TraitProperty</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/densemapinfo-0850ceaef7df0277a483963b2b263ec6/#acdbea8daea873bc3a9853bd4160536dd">getEmptyKey</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
